enabled.title: OHSSO auth
enabled.description: Enable OHSSO authentication for prometheus and grafana.

client_id.title: OHSSO Client ID
client_id.description: The client ID for the OH Monitoring modules.

client_secret.title: OHSSO Client Secret
client_secret.description: The client secret for the OH Monitoring modules.

replicas.title: Prometheus Replicas
replicas.description: The number of Prometheus replicas to deploy.

protocol.title: Prometheus protocol
protocol.description: The protocol to expose Prometheus (http or https).

host.title: Prometheus Host
host.description: The hostname to expose Prometheus (for example: oh-modules-prometheus.apps.lab.openshift.com).

kafka_namespace.title: Kafka Namespace
kafka_namespace.description: The namespace where Kafka is deployed.

oh_modules_namespace.title: OH Modules Namespace
oh_modules_namespace.description: The namespace where OH Modules are deployed.

enabled.title: Enable Prometheus Persistence
enabled.description: Enable Prometheus Persistence with storage class.

size.title: Persistence Size
size.description: The size of the persistent volume for Prometheus.

storageclass.title: Storage Class
storageclass.description: The storage class for the persistent volume.

protocol.title: Grafana Protocol
protocol.description: The protocol to expose Grafana (http or https).

host.title: Grafana Host
host.description: The hostname to expose Grafana (for example: oh-modules-monitoring.apps.lab.openshift.com).

admin_user.title: Grafana Admin User
admin_user.description: The admin username for Grafana (only used when OHSSO authentication is disabled).

admin_pass.title: Grafana Admin Password
admin_pass.description: The admin password for Grafana (only used when OHSSO authentication is disabled).
